nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 3am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Cloudy, with a low around 69. South wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 75, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. South wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 62, with temperatures rising to around 64 overnight. South southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Sunny
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before noon. Mostly sunny. High near 76, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 53, with temperatures rising to around 55 overnight. West northwest wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. North wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before midnight, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. Northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 70. East wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. South southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Mostly sunny, with a high near 70. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Clear
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before midnight. Mostly clear, with a low around 51. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62.
